img_above_text:
![Wukong LowerHollow 84.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a3/Wukong_LowerHollow_84.jpg)
Similarly, you'll also need to be careful if you want to employ your Immobilizing spell, as you don't watch to catch her with her body too high in the air to hit. Try instead to catch her right after an attack where she ducks low to strike at you, and make the most of that time or after staggering her when she falls down.
img_below_text:
Once she reaches about half of her health or less, you'll need to keep your eyes peeled for when she dives her head into the ground. This will leave only her rear abdomen sticking out of the ground, but resist the urge to smack at it. Zhu Bajie may try to warn you, but it may not come out in time that she's preparing a deadly poison explosion!
![Wukong LowerHollow 81.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/cb/Wukong_LowerHollow_81.jpg)

content.text:

            Image Position:
            - This is 77 from the file 'Webbed_Hollow_-_Lower_Hollow_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong LowerHollow 84.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a3/Wukong_LowerHollow_84.jpg)
Similarly, you'll also need to be careful if you want to employ your Immobilizing spell, as you don't watch to catch her with her body too high in the air to hit. Try instead to catch her right after an attack where she ducks low to strike at you, and make the most of that time or after staggering her when she falls down."
            - Following Text: "Once she reaches about half of her health or less, you'll need to keep your eyes peeled for when she dives her head into the ground. This will leave only her rear abdomen sticking out of the ground, but resist the urge to smack at it. Zhu Bajie may try to warn you, but it may not come out in time that she's preparing a deadly poison explosion!
![Wukong LowerHollow 81.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/cb/Wukong_LowerHollow_81.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a battle scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," featuring the protagonist facing off against a large spider-like creature known as the Violet Spider. The preceding text advises players on the strategic use of an Immobilizing spell during the fight, while the following text warns players about the creature's deadly poison explosion attack when its health is low. The image serves to illustrate the intense and strategic nature of the encounter with the Violet Spider.
